attributes.action: Start using the Hydrogen Feuls that reduce emissions from cars by 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mixtures of Hydrogen feul can be used with normal car engines as an alternative feul source to the consumer - the technology and availability is here, however reducing emissions for all road users by 50% is not something that the government will do - they need to tax money from conventional poluting feuls.
Please sign to help save the environment today - not before it is too late...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
